description:
This market refers to the StarCraft II match between Elazer and Krystianer in the HomeStory Cup XXVIII Group C, scheduled for January 31 at 11:15AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Elazer" if Elazer wins 2 or more maps than Krystianer in this match.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Krystianer".

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

events.description:
This market refers to the StarCraft II match between Elazer and Krystianer in the HomeStory Cup XXVIII Group C, scheduled for January 31 at 11:15AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Elazer" if Elazer win the match against Krystianer.

This market will resolve to "Krystianer" if Krystianer win the match against Elazer.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://liquipedia.net/starcraft2/Main_Page.
events.title: StarCraft II: Elazer vs Krystianer (BO3) - HomeStory Cup XXVIII Group C

question: Map Handicap: Elazer (-1.5) vs Krystianer (+1.5)
